venue.name: Boston Red Dog Pet Resort & Spa

item.description:
Fenway Bark in South Boston has informed us that they are no longer able to host our monthly Pug Meetups.  No need to worry...our group is moving down the street just a few miles to Boston Red Dog Pet Resort & Spa.

Red Dog has a beautiful playroom with rubber floors, chairs, restrooms (for humans) and tons of exclusive space for our pugs to run and play.  Our new Meetup facility charges by the hour and we can have use of the room from one-two hours depending on the number of attendees we have on that day.  I will be collecting a fee from each pug family on the day of the Meetup of $5 per dog for the first two dogs and $1 for each additional (for those of us that have a handful of pugs).  The facility is very clean and well managed and they require all pugs attending the Meetups to have veterinary proof of Rabies & Distemper vaccinations. You will not be able to participate in the Meetup without these records from your vet.

Check out our new home!  http://www.bostonreddog.com/


Thanks everyone and we look forward to seeing you!!
item.name: Boston Pug Meetup
